trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Culver
There were no other sightings in Culver on or around September 12th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS SEPTEMBER 12 2008 AT 12;45 AM, WE WERE COMING HOME FROM A TRIP TO THE WILLAMETTE VALLEY DRIVING NORTH OVER JUNIPER BUTTE MY WIFE AND I SPOTTED A WHITE BALL OF LIGHT TO OUR LEFT (WEST NEAR CULVER). THOUGHT IT MIGHT BE A PLANE BUT AS WE NEARED THE BOTTOM IT STARTED TO PARALEL US AS WE WENT FARTHER .IT WAS AT 1000 FEET OR SO ABOVE THE GROUND. THE WIFE SUGGESTED WE STOP , AND WHEN I GOT OUT OF THE CAR IT MOVED NORTH A LITTLE WAYS THEN IT STOPPED, I GOT BACK IN THE CAR AND PROCEDED ON AND IT STARTED FOLLOWING US AGAIN . BEING SCARED I DROVE FASTER ,THEN DROVE SLOWER TO SEE IF IT WOULD DO THE SAME THING AND IT DID.THE OBJECT STAYED WITH US UNTIL WE REACHED MADRAS.WHEN WE ARRIVED HOME I WENT IN AND GOT MY CAMCORDER BUT IT STAYED NEAR ROUND BUTTE ONLY BRIEFLY AND HEADED BACK SLOWLY WERE IT WAS FIRST SPOTTED SO I DID'NT GET ANY VIDEO.
